member.name: T:FearValleyNetwork.NetOP
member.summary: Defines the network operation codes used by all network commands.
member.remarks:
The Operation codes are roughly in the order that a typical game will play out.
Codes 1-10 are used to initialize the game pieces.
Codes 20-50 are reserved for player actions.
Codes 6X are reserved for manipulating controls and UI.
Codes 7X are reserved for scene transitions.
